name: Pandash
description:
Alpha Stage ----==[ Controls ]==----
  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Attack: E
  • Stomp: Down Arrow + E
  • Active Skill 1: Q
  • Active Skill 2: W
  • Activate: F
  • Open Minimap/Passive Perks: Tab
  • Pause: Escape
----==[ The Hook ]==----

Pandash is a roguelight with a random world.

It consists of different procedual generated zones. The single elements are hand craftet and balanced out to find the best between randomness and fun!

The player walks in this side scroller world as a panda who lost his memories. There are many perks to find and unlock. Currently different enemies roam 2 worlds with 2 bosses.

----==[ The World ]==---- -=UNLOCKABLES=-

[In Progress] There are many unlockables planned to find and ...unlock!
 

-=PERKS=-

In this world many perks can be found to change your playstyle. Here is just an example of the  sprites  planned.

 

-=SHOPS=-

Different shops wait for you to visit. Just say hi and bring some credits with you! You need a bomb? You need some defence? You will find someone for that!

-=ENEMIES =-

Different types of enemies will hinder your journey - or ... end it.

[Swordmaster]


[Batadon]

[Spong]

[Zarto]

[Lancemaster]

[Gador]

[Nambui]

-=Story=-

[Story in Progress]

 

----==[ Development]==----

This is a solo dev project I started over 2 years ago. It was made to learn something new. It is not perfect but it makes fun to create something and I appreciate any feedback you can given to me!

Please consider to write a comment or send me an E-Mail to LaaabStudios@web.de.

Thank you!
